column4: Any chance someone with a working mplayer could try one of the realaudio test samples: mplayer http://service.real.com/learnnav/testrams/b256realaudio8.ram
works great for me in totem
I'm trying to get www.bbc.co.uk liveaudio working. You don't happen to know whether that works for you in totem do you?
totem doesn't recognize a .ram for me - any idea what I'm doing wrong (yes, I installed real player!)
